name: Chicken Run (itch) (tonymichaelhead)
description:
Frank is a slightly above-average chicken who always knew he was meant for something more. But when he found out he'd be visiting the butcher's block tomorrow, that's when he knew—it's time to bust out of this joint.

Relive your childhood on with this short, classical 16bit JRPG that can be completed in an evening.

Features:

  • A short but unforgettable story
  • Quirky, lovable characters.
  • 16bit graphics reminiscent of the 90's JRPG era
  • Classic turn-based combat
  • One dungeon with casual puzzle elements
  • Crazy weapon/armor upgrades
  • EPIC dad jokes.
  • The hero is a chicken

Playtime: 30mins-1hr
